mbean.name: jboss:type=Service,name=NotibProperties
mbean.attribute:
es.caib.notib.datasource.jndi=jdbc/NotibDS
es.caib.notib.hibernate.dialect=es.caib.notib.core.dialect.NotibOracleDialect es.caib.notib.hibernate.show_sql=false es.caib.notib.hibernate.format_sql=false es.caib.notib.hibernate.use_sql_comments=false es.caib.notib.hibernate.hbm2ddl.auto=none
es.caib.notib.email.jndi=mail/LimitSession
es.caib.notib.notifica.url=https://se-notificaws.redsara.es:1443/ws/notificaWsV21 es.caib.notib.notifica.sede.url=https://se-notificaws.redsara.es:1443/ws/soap/SedeWs es.caib.notib.notifica.username= es.caib.notib.notifica.password= es.caib.notib.notifica.clau.xifrat.ids=P0rt4FI8
es.caib.notib.plugin.dades.usuari.jdbc.datasource.jndi.name=java:comp/env/jdbc/UsuarisDS
es.caib.notib.plugin.registre.url=https://dev.caib.es/regweb3/ws/v3 es.caib.notib.plugin.registre.usuari=$notib_regweb es.caib.notib.plugin.registre.password=notib_regweb
es.caib.notib.plugin.regweb.mock.sequencia=/home/bgalmes/Programs/notib/notib-plugin-impl/src/main/resources/es/caib/notib/plugin/caib/registre/registre.txt es.caib.notib.plugin.regweb.mock.justificant=/home/bgalmes/Programs/notib/notib-plugin-impl/src/main/resources/es/caib/notib/plugin/caib/registre/justificant.pdf
es.caib.notib.plugin.arxiu.csv.base.url=https://dev.caib.es/concsv es.caib.notib.plugin.arxiu.caib.base.url=https://afirmades.caib.es:4430/esb es.caib.notib.plugin.arxiu.caib.usuari=app1 es.caib.notib.plugin.arxiu.caib.contrasenya=app1
es.caib.notib.plugin.arxiu.caib.conversio.imprimible.url.uuid=https://dev.caib.es/concsv/rest/printable/uuid es.caib.notib.plugin.arxiu.caib.conversio.imprimible.url.csv=https://dev.caib.es/concsv/rest/printable es.caib.notib.plugin.arxiu.caib.conversio.imprimible.usuari=$ripea_concsv es.caib.notib.plugin.arxiu.caib.conversio.imprimible.contrasenya=ripea_concsv es.caib.notib.plugin.arxiu.verificacio.baseurl=https://dev.caib.es/concsv/view.xhtml?hash=
es.caib.notib.plugin.unitats.dir3.url=https://dev.caib.es/dir3caib
es.caib.notib.plugin.unitats.dir3.username=$notib_dir3caib es.caib.notib.plugin.unitats.dir3.password=notib_dir3caib
es.caib.notib.plugin.gesconadm.base.url=https://dev.caib.es/rolsac es.caib.notib.plugin.gesconadm.username=$distribucio_rolsac es.caib.notib.plugin.gesconadm.password=distribucio_rolsac
es.caib.notib.test.db.driver=org.hsqldb.jdbcDriver es.caib.notib.test.db.url=jdbc:hsqldb:hsql://localhost:9001 es.caib.notib.test.db.username=sa es.caib.notib.test.db.password=
